equalGraphs

public static boolean equalGraphs(InspectableGraph g1,
                                  InspectableGraph g2)
Returns true for graphs g1 and g2 have identical elements. More specifically, returns true if and only if:
  • g1 and g2 have the same node/edge count
  • each node of g1 is contained in g2
  • each edge of g1 is contained in g2

Since a node or an edge cannot be contained multiple times in a graph, this sufficies.
